price: Dan jangan sampai mereka menghalang-halangi engkau (Muhammad) untuk (menyampaikan) ayat-ayat Allah, setelah ayat-ayat itu diturunkan kepadamu, dan serulah (manusia) agar (beriman) kepada Tuhanmu, dan janganlah engkau termasuk orang-orang musyrik.
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُنزِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yaṣuddunnaka ʿan āyāti al-lahi baʿda idh unzilat ilayka wa-ud'ʿu ilā rabbika walā takūnanna mina al-mush'rikīna
